typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		right_node as long,
		left_node as long,
		parent_company_id as long,
		company_id as long,
		company_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.sf_company_b_tree',
	format: 'query') ~> CompanyBtreeLeft
source(output(
		right_node as long,
		left_node as long,
		parent_company_id as long,
		company_id as long,
		company_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.sf_company_b_tree',
	format: 'query') ~> ComapnyBtreeRight
CompanyBtreeLeft, ComapnyBtreeRight join(CompanyBtreeLeft@left_node >= ComapnyBtreeRight@left_node
	&& CompanyBtreeLeft@left_node <= ComapnyBtreeRight@right_node,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'left')~> leftRightCompany
leftRightCompany filter(ComapnyBtreeRight@parent_company_id == -1) ~> FilteredValues
FilteredValues select(mapColumn(
		company_name = {CompanyBtreeLeft@company_name},
		company_id = {CompanyBtreeLeft@company_id},
		company_name_top_group = {ComapnyBtreeRight@company_name},
		company_id_top_group = {ComapnyBtreeRight@company_id}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumns
SelectedColumns sink(input(
		company_name_top_group as string,
		company_id_top_group as long,
		company_name as string,
		company_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SfCompanyTopGroup
